notes: Upscale, well-maintained apartment with crystal chandeliers, glossy tile floors, built-in cabinetry, and modern recessed/cove lighting. The space is very spacious at 57 ping with a large open living and dining area. For baby safety, the hard tile floors and sharp-cornered wooden dining furniture would need padding; the large floor-to-ceiling windows appear to have a balcony railing visible outside but should be verified. Good natural light from large windows.
